channel.title: Edit 562 ip changer?
channel.description:
Ok so i downloaded the "khanz 562 ip changer"
It works fine...but how do i edit it?
This is what i want to do:
[ul][li]Make the ip stay the same (so you don't have to type it in all the time)[/li] [li]Put my servers name on it instead of it saying "khanz 562 ip changer"[/li][/ul]
Only thing is that there is no .java files to edit or a compiler...
And when i tried to edit it with DJ decompiler it said it was too big (but it opened it) then i changed it and saved as a .java but i had no compiler...so i tried to use a compiler from my 317 source and i got an error...and it never worked...(i only changed 1 ip in the client.java because there was no gui or egui)
So how do i change these?

item.title: Edit 562 ip changer?
item.dc:creator: @Coldkill Coldkill
item.description:
@Coldkill wrote:

Ok so i downloaded the “khanz 562 ip changer”

It works fine…but how do i edit it?

This is what i want to do:

[ul][li]Make the ip stay the same (so you don’t have to type it in all the time)[/li]
[li]Put my servers name on it instead of it saying “khanz 562 ip changer”[/li][/ul]

Only thing is that there is no .java files to edit or a compiler…

And when i tried to edit it with DJ decompiler it said it was too big (but it opened it)
then i changed it and saved as a .java but i had no compiler…so i tried to use a compiler from my 317 source and i got an error…and it never worked…(i only changed 1 ip in the client.java because there was no gui or egui)

So how do i change these?

Read full topic
